title: A systematic review of machine learning techniques for stance detection and its applications

tldr.text: A systematic literature review of empirical research on the machine learning (ML) models for stance detection that were published from January 2015 to October 2022 reveals that deep learning models that adopt a mechanism of self-attention have been used more frequently than the other approaches.
